title: Spartan Tutors V2
text: A complete reimplementation of the Spartan Tutors insfrastructure and app.
Build using React Native and NodeJS.

title: Telegram Bot
text: A telegram bot that scans for messages and automatically buys meme coins, mimicking meme coins whale movements.

title: Spartan Tutors
text: This is my biggest project yet.
Built using Swift, the app connects tutors and students through a simple UI.

title: SpartaHack Website
text: Together with 2 friends built the website for SpartaHack 8.
Supports features like registering, exporting data and cheking users in.

title: Web Scraping With Python
text: A small script that logs in and extract data from other Junior companies so I could contact them.

title: Automating Data Extraction
text: This customizable script connects Google Sheets and Pipefy's API to extract data daily, making it simpler to generate metrics.
